author: crossley
msg: There is a .htaccess in this directory.
Its purpose is to deliver DTDs and associated resources to some
impoverished XML tools that do not use the Catalog Entity Resolver.
The .htaccess uses Files/ForceType to set proper content-type.

author: joes
msg: destructor calls, otherwise they leak ~ 8K per instance.
This bug only impacts the cgi and test environments.
